verbs.description: As [ARG0: you] [V: knew] [ARG1: he would] , President Donald Trump has weighed in on the NFL 's new national anthem policy . He 's a fan of it .
As you knew he [V: would] , President Donald Trump has weighed in on the NFL 's new national anthem policy . He 's a fan of it .
As you knew he would , President Donald Trump [V: has] weighed in on the NFL 's new national anthem policy . He 's a fan of it .
[ARGM-ADV: As you knew he would] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: weighed] in [ARG1: on the NFL 's new national anthem policy] . He 's a fan of it .
As you knew he would , President Donald Trump has weighed in on the NFL 's new national anthem policy . [ARG1: He] [V: 's] [ARG2: a fan of it] .
